Biscay.text:
Wind
In northwest, cyclonic becoming northerly 3 to 5, increasing 7 to severe gale 9 for a time. In southeast, variable 2 to 4, becoming cyclonic 6 to gale 8 later.
Sea state
In northwest, slight or moderate becoming moderate or rough. in southeast, slight or moderate, becoming rough or very rough later.
Weather
In northwest, rain then showers. In southeast, rain later.
Visibility
In northwest, good, occasionally poor. In southeast, good, occasionally poor later.
